attributes.action: Cancel/reduce the 69 days of recess Parliament has for this summer.
attributes.additional_details: It cannot be in the country's best interests for Parliament to  sit for only 6 days between 24th July and 9th Oct.
attributes.background: With BREXIT negotiations reaching a critical stage, and this being “the most important peacetime operation” that the government has ever mounted. (David Davis) - Parliament should not recess for the planned 42 days in the summer followed shortly by 27 days for the Conference season.
